channel.title: Python on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Python on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Python packages
item.description: Anaconda’s Python Distribution comes with many of the packages we need to do scientific computing. If you’re interested in all the packages included, click here and go to the Python 3.x tab. pip Howevever, you may come across packages that are not installed by default. In this case we recommend you use the pip package management tool to install them. !!! note If your python 3 was found via python3 --version on the previous page, then type pip3 instead of pip for all of the following python plugins.
